text: Lottia dorsuosa is a species of limpet in the family Lottiidae. It is known commonly as the bumpy limpet. It is native to the northwestern Pacific, occurring along the coasts of Japan, Korea, and Taiwan.Lottia dorsuosa. SeaLifeBase. ==References== ==External links== *Bouchet, P. (2015). Lottia dorsuosa (Gould, 1859). In: MolluscaBase (2015). Accessed through: World Register of Marine Species. Category:Lottiidae Category:Gastropods described in 1859
title: Lottia dorsuosa
